name: Pilot Dash
description:
You are a pilot and you need to platform through the plane to get back to the cockpit as fast as possible.

Comment With Your Best Time! (Maybe link a video if you are feleling spicy and wanna be considered world record holder )

Controls

Left / Right : A / D

Jump : W

Crouch : S

LlamaDev's Itch : https://llamadev-games.itch.io/
LlamaDev's YT Channel : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC4UAbwMZQdi0UyGTORL6zPw/
